name: Omega-3 Infused Asparagus
description: Indulge in the goodness of Omega-3 Infused Asparagus, a perfect blend of health and flavor. This recipe is designed with health in mind, ensuring a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet without sacrificing taste. Ideal for anyone looking for healthy and delicious meal options.

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the woody ends off the asparagus.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the asparagus under cold water to remove any dirt or sediment.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil and blanch the asparagus for 2-3 minutes until vibrant and slightly tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the asparagus and immediately plunge into ice water to stop the cooking process.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pat the asparagus dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the fish oil over the asparagus and toss to evenly coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Omega-3 Infused Asparagus as a nutritious side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
